objects = [<User: User object>, <User: User object>, <User: User object>, <User: User object>, <User: User object>, <User: User object>, <User: User object>, <User: User object>, <User: User object>, <User: User object>, <User: User object>, <User: User object>, <User: User object>]¶
password¶

A unicode string field.

preferences¶

A list field that wraps a standard field, allowing multiple instances of the field to be used as a list in the database.

If using with ReferenceFields see: many-to-many-with-listfields

Note

Required means it cannot be empty - as the default for ListFields is []
